# Rabbit Hole Transformation Issues Template

## Milestone Structure

Use these milestones to organize issues:
- **Phase 1: Foundation (Weeks 1-2)** - Make backend visible
- **Phase 2: Workflows (Weeks 3-4)** - Enable user actions
- **Phase 3: Intelligence (Weeks 5-6)** - Automate quality
- **Phase 4: Polish (Weeks 7-8)** - Enhance UX
- **Phase 5: Advanced (Weeks 9-12)** - Unique features

## Labels

- `priority-critical` - Immediate impact, blocking other work
- `priority-high` - Important for core vision
- `priority-medium` - Enhances experience
- `priority-low` - Nice to have
- `phase-1`, `phase-2`, `phase-3`, `phase-4`, `phase-5`
- `frontend` - UI/UX work
- `backend` - API/database work
- `fullstack` - Requires both
- `documentation` - Docs/guides
- `bug` - Something broken
- `enhancement` - New feature
